name: Space Tunnel 2
description:
Space Tunnel 2 (made in Gamemaker 8) is one of my oldest games I ever made. Back in 2009 I wanted to create a really simple and straightforward game without fancy graphics.

In 2012 I reworked the game with a lot of extras and this year I added some new elements like a more sensitive keyboard control as well as gamepad support and many more improvements.

The reason I think the game works is because the extremely simple game principle goes hand in hand with the blocky aesthetics and midi music in a way that motivates the player to always push forward, just. one. more. time, without distracting elements, merely focusing on the fast-paced and progressive gameplay.

Players have the choice to keep their scores offline or to upload their runs onto an online leaderboard, powered by gmscoreboard.com.

Space Tunnel 2: Easy to learn, extremely hard to master!

Good luck and skill!
